column4: Please can someone tell me if they have a setup where more than one app can write sound?!
To the mixer.
I don't know >.< Its an oldish card.
It might just be my software setup? It mixes fine on windows.
Okay.
How can I find my alsa version?
Could someone recommend to me a nice way of finding the largest _directories_ within the current directory?
du
Don't worry, got it
Worst idea ever?
lol... mine or his?
but can it write to ext3 just as easily?
and what is the name of this driver?
Yours. FAT is old, unjournalled, awful character set, and a limit on file size.
I'll find it. It's called IFS or something.
true... but can't beat it for os compatibility
and can this driver do write access to ext3?
It can.
thank you
And that's a small gain over a huge loss.
true...
